tool_description: Executes statistics update operations based on maintenance schedules, handling both immediate and scheduled updates with progress tracking.

connection_id.description: Database connection identifier for executing updates

schedule_id.description: Schedule ID from Statistics Maintenance Scheduler (for scheduled execution)

target_objects.description: Specific objects to update (schema.table or schema.table.column)

force_update.description: Force update even if statistics appear current

error_messages: Invalid connection: Connection ID not found or connection closed.
Schedule not found: Specified schedule ID does not exist.
Invalid target objects: Object names must follow schema.table or schema.table.column format.
Invalid update type: Use one of [full, incremental, sample].
Invalid sample percentage: Must be between 1-100 for sample updates.
Update failed: Statistics update operation failed due to system constraints or locks.
usage: Provide connection_id and update_type for execution. Use schedule_id for scheduled updates or target_objects for ad-hoc updates. Set sample_percentage for sample updates and force_update to override currency checks.

failed_objects.description: List of objects that failed to update
